Attended A.F.L. Grand Finals on 25/9/2010 & 2/10/2010 as guest of Qantas with my son
Travelled to Chevron's Barrow Island Gorgon Project on a charter provided by Chevron on October 9, 2010
Travelled to Hancock Coal Pty Ltd's Alpha Coal Mine on a charter provided by the company on November 6, 2010
Attended the 2010 Melbourne Cup with my son as a guest of Emirates on November 6, 2010

disclosures.entity: Distilled Spirits Industry Council of Australia Inc
disclosures.details: Attended a meeting of the Distilled Spirits Industry Council of Australia Inc at Peppers, Sutton Forest, NSW on May 16, 2011. The cost of overnight accommodation for a staff member and myself was paid by the Distilled Spirits Industry Council of Australia Inc.
Attended the Centre for Independent Studies Consilium at the Hyatt Regency, Coolum on July 28, 2011. The cost of my overnight accommodation was met by the Centre for Independent Studies.
Qantas upgraded me from economy to business class on a private return trip to Canberra from Melbourne on 28-30 December 2011
At a reception hosted by the Indian High Commissioner, Ms Sujatha Singh on Saturday 17 December 2011 to welcome the Indian Cricket team, I was presented with a cricket bat by the team.
During a ministerial visit to Thailand and China on Wednesday 30 May 2012 I was upgraded by Emirates to first class on flight 419 from Sydney to Bangkok.
Attended the Melbourne Rebels game against the Bulls on Friday 4 May 2012 as a guest of the Board responsible for the management of AMMI Park.

On Thursday 19 July 2012 accompanied by two staff, I inspected Xstrata's Mangoola and Bulga mines via a helicopter chartered by the company. The helicopter dropped us off at Sydney airport on the same day where we caught a commercial flight to Melbourne.
Virgin Australia presented me with a Samsung Galaxy tablet on 12 September 2012.

During a ministerial visit to Ceduna on 7 and 8 September 2012 during the course of which I opened the extension of the Ceduna Community Hotel/Motel, I was provided with overnight accommodation at the hotel at no charge. The same benefit was extended to a member of my staff.

The Samsung Galaxy tablet presented to me by Virgin Australia on 15 August 2012 and retained by me for my office was valued at $479 and therefore above my entitlement. I have paid the difference of $179 to the collector of public monies.
Attended the AFL Grand Final on Saturday 29 September 2012 as a guest of Qantas with my son.
On Tuesday 6 November 2012, I attended the Melbourne cup as a guest of Emirates and was again accompanied by my son.
Travelled from Brisbane to Chinchilla on a return charter flight arranged for and paid by Xstrata Coal as part of an official ministerial engagement on Saturday 15 December 2012

Following the death of my mother in June 2012, I will receive a one-fifth share of the estate. This involves a small share portfolio which is being disposed of on my behalf by a trustee at arms length to me.

Travelled from Brisbane to Dalby on a return charter flight arranged for and paid by the Queensland Curtis LNG Project on Friday 8 March 2013 as part of an official ministerial engagement. I was accompanied by staff and the purpose of the visit was to inspect the project.
Attended the Collingwood vs. Carlton game at the Melbourne Cricket Ground with my son as a guest of BHP Billiton on Sunday 7 April 2013.

A trip to China from 17 – 23 May 2013 to attend the Australia-China Dialogue on Marine Eco Tourism in Ninghan. The trip also included time in Shanghai and Beijing to attend a series of high-level meetings. The cost of the trip was covered by the Australia-China Club.
